snippet: The match would create the nation’s biggest airline and concentrate even further a once-fragmented industry.
abstract: American Airlines and US Airways appear likely to announce a merger that would create  nation's biggest airline, further concentrating once-fragmented industry; regulators are expected to approve deal.
lead_paragraph: The match would create the nation’s biggest airline and concentrate even further a once-fragmented industry.

headline.main: American and US Airways May Announce a Merger This Week
headline.print_headline: American and US Airways May Announce a Merger This Week
